title: Cotton yield per harvested acre in the U.S. 2000 to 2019
summary: Overall Yield per acre in pounds has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2003 and 2004.
The highest Yield per acre in pounds, of value 892.0 was reached at Year 2012
Minimum Yield per acre in pounds about 665.0 was reached at Year 2002
min_summary: Overall Yield per acre in pounds has increased over the Year.
mid_summary: In general Yield per acre in pounds has rose over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2003 and 2004.
The highest Yield per acre in pounds, of value 892.0 was reached at Year 2012
Minimum Yield per acre in pounds about 665.0 was reached at Year 2002
